commitResults.messageTitle: Add increment: Level-0
Add increment: Level-1
Refactoring by extracting echo as a method to be called for Level-1
Add increment: Level-2
Change list to start from 1 instead of 0 for Level-2
Add increment: Level-3
commitResults.messageBody:
Implement a simple validation method for marking and unmarking the
list also.

Prevents ArrayIndexOutOfBounds exception, NumberFormatException
and prevent the user from accessing item list numbers that are not
yet created.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add increments: Level-4, A-TextUiTesting and A-CodeQuality
commitResults.messageBody:
* Add support for tracking todo, deadline and event types
* Implement a TaskManager class to manage all types of tasks,
refactor the methods to manage tasks originally in Duke to
TaskManager
* Remove comments in lines 9 and 10 in Duke
* Set up test using the I/O redirection technique

commitResults.messageTitle: Add increments: Level-5, A-Exceptions, A-Packages
commitResults.messageBody:
* Add support for handling errors when user gives incorrect inputs
  which includes:
  * Not using the correct keywords
  * Having no description when creating a task
  * Having no time details when creating a task
  * Not having an integer value when marking or unmarking a task
* Add a help message when user does use the correct keywords
* Add custom exceptions to have semantic errors
* Refactor classes into packages for organization of code
* Refactor markTask and unmarkTask in TaskManager to be a single
  method
* MAXTASKCOUNT in TaskManager in all uppercase to adhere to coding
  standards.

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch branch-Level-5 with master branch without fast forward
commitResults.messageBody: This merge commit includes A-Exceptions and A-Packages

commitResults.messageTitle: Add increment: Level-6 * Add support for deleting tasks from the list by changing the   underlying data structure for taskList from an array to an   arraylist
commitResults.messageBody:
* Update all TaskManager methods to work with an arraylist data
  structure instead of an array

commitResults.messageTitle: Add preliminary version of TaskRecorder class
commitResults.messageBody:
This version is a standalone version still in debugging phase.
To be merged with master branch as integration require changes
from branch-Level-6.

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'branch-Level-6' into master branch to implement delete functionality
Merge branch 'branch-Level-7' into master branch and resolve merge conflict
commitResults.messageBody:
branch-Level-7 implements the prelimary code for
saving the task list and further integration with
branch-Level-6 is needed in the master branch

commitResults.messageTitle: Remove unnecessary comment in TaskManager
Integrate TaskRecorder with TaskManager
commitResults.messageBody:
Duke is now able to update any changes to the save file.

Specifically, any add, delete, mark or unmark command will be saved.
The data can then be retrieved the next name Duke boots up.

commitResults.messageTitle: Extract code that gets the command word into a method
commitResults.messageBody: To adhere to SLAP

commitResults.messageTitle: Rename taskList to tasks
commitResults.messageBody: To adhere to variable naming coding standards

commitResults.messageTitle: Remove magic number by introducing variables
commitResults.messageBody: To avoid magic number that does not explain the meaning of the number

commitResults.messageTitle: Rename output to tasks
commitResults.messageBody: To adhere to variable naming coding standards

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor code in Duke.java into new class
commitResults.messageBody:
Code related to parsing user inputs and printing messages is
refactored into new class to adhere to OOP coding paradigm.

commitResults.messageTitle: Further refactor code in Parser.java
commitResults.messageBody:
Code related to parsing user inputs and printing messages are
separate functionalities that are refactored into two classes to
adhere to OOP coding paradigm.

commitResults.messageTitle: Further refactor code in TaskManager.java
commitResults.messageBody:
Code related to printing messages are refactored into
UserInterface.java to adhere to OOP coding paradigm.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add increment: Level-9
commitResults.messageBody: Give users a way to find a task by searching for a keyword.

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge pull request #1 from branch-Level-9 to master
commitResults.messageBody: To implement find keywords functionality in master branch.

commitResults.messageTitle: Extract out commands as separate classes
commitResults.messageBody:
Code related to execute specific commands from users are
refactored into separate classes to adhere to OOP coding paradigm.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add JavaDoc comments to code
Merge pull request #2 from tanweili/branch-A-JavaDoc
commitResults.messageBody: Add JavaDoc comments to code

commitResults.messageTitle: Update message printed when adding task
Add a user guide
commitResults.messageBody:
User guide describes the main functionalities of Duke for new users
to reference.

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge pull request #3 from tanweili/Published-UG
commitResults.messageBody: Add a user guide

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix error when no date is given for deadline and event
commitResults.messageBody:
Duke now responds to empty timing details given for deadline and
event objects.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add description to show if data file has been loaded
commitResults.messageBody:
Duke will now describe whether it can find the data file and the
directory. Duke will state it will create the folder and/or file if
it cannot find them.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix bug where add commands save userInput with wrong formats
commitResults.messageBody:
Duke now only saves inputs with correct format to be loaded next
time.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add functionality to only store one form of date time format
commitResults.messageBody:
Duke now only accepts one proper date time format for event and
deadline items. This prevents non-time related information to be
added in.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update README.md and added descriptions
commitResults.messageBody: Duke will now prompt user to get help if they need to.

commitResults.messageTitle: Minor grammatical update
Add minor change to Duke output to user to be more user friendly
Add another change to Duke output to user to be more user friendly
Update help message and no command given message
commitResults.messageBody:
Duke will now give examples for adding tasks in the correct format
and encourage user to get help for empty commands.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add more javadoc comments
commitResults.messageBody:
To show more explanations for more classes and methods in terms of
their usages.
